Package com.btmatthews.selenium.junit4.rule

Custom JUnit 4 rules for use with the SeleniumJUnit4ClassRunner.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ScreenCapture A method rule that provides a consistent interface for performing screen captures with either of the Selenium Server or Web Driver APIs.
 

Package com.btmatthews.selenium.junit4.rule Description

Custom JUnit 4 rules for use with the SeleniumJUnit4ClassRunner.
